channel.title: Giant Enemy Crab
channel.itunes:subtitle: OMFG - Original Media for Gamers
channel.itunes:author: Slanik and Turpster
channel.description: Two of the Greats of Podcasting have joined forces to bring you the ultimate show! Slanik and Turpster have turned the sound level to AWESOME!!!!!!

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 10 - Bromance Lane
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 10 - Bromance Lane
item.description: This week on Giant Enemy Crab, we discover the depth of Slanik and Turpters Bromance, review Just Cause 2, list our personal favorite april fools jokes, and all while Turpster is on a 56k modem in China.
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Game Review, Just Cause Review, Just Cause 2, April fools, Blur Beta, Beta Key, Give Away

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 9 - Show us your Themes!
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 9 - Show us your Themes!
item.description: This week we review Command and Conquer 4, battle through illness, try and figure out why hacking XBox live is awesome and give away some Blur Beta Keys!
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Beta, Starcraft, Starcraft 2, Heavy Rain, Gaming, Game Review, CandC4, Command and Conquer 4 review

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 8 - ATwo Flusher
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 8 - ATwo Flusher
item.description: Welcome to Giant Enemy Crab Episode 8! So good, you'll need to flush this bad boy twice. This week we find the best way to stop hacking in multiplayer games, Review God of War 3, and try and solve the mystery of the eleventy billion downloads.
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Beta, Starcraft, Starcraft 2, Heavy Rain, Gaming, Game Review, God of War, God of War 3, GOW, God of War review, GOW3 Review

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 7 - Highly Flamable
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 7 - Highly Flamable
item.description: This week on Giant Enemy Crab, we discover the Perils of Time Zones, why 'Merica just has to be different, review Final Fantasy XIII and find out just how flamable Slanik is.
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Beta, Starcraft, Starcraft 2, Starcraft II, Final Fantasy XIII, Game Review

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 6 - Dirty Words!
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 6 - Dirty Words!
item.description: This week in the Amazing Episode 6 we discover what words are not in Scibblenauts, we nerd-gasm over Portal 2, review Supreme Commander 2 (lego commander) and give away a Starcraft 2 Beta Key!
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Giant Enemy Crab, Starcraft 2, Starcraft 2 beta. Key, podcast, Game Review, Supreme Commander 2

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 5 - Hotdogs in a Can
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 5 - Hotdogs in a Can
item.description: This week we Review Heavy Rain, discover the perils of tined goods, the dangers of having a fatty, and give out details on how to win a Starcraft 2 Beta Key!
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Beta, Starcraft, Starcraft 2, Heavy Rain, Gaming, Game Review, Heavy Rain Review

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 4 - Gold, Always believe in your Soul
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 4 - Gold, Always believe in your Soul
item.description: This week we go all Starcraft 2 Beta on your ass. We discover Slanik's ability to improvise when Turpster decides to go bye bye, and give our Top 10 multiplayer games!
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Beta, Starcraft, Starcraft 2, Starcraft II

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 3 - A Slap in the Face
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 3 - A Slap in the Face
item.description: This week we review Bioshock 2, discuss Games that crushed our dreams and find out that this really is the best store on the citadel.
item.itunes:keywords: Giant Enemy Crab, Slanik, Turpster, Bioshock 2, GEC, Podcast, Game Review

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Episode 2 - T-Gasm
item.description: Welcome Back for Episode 2! This week we review Star Trek Online, give you details on how to get the Heavy Rain demo, try our best to help with an impossible situation, give you details on how to win Aliens VS Predator on PC, and discover the strange noises Turpster makes when excited!
item.itunes:keywords: Giant Enemy Crab, Slanik, Turpster, Aliens Vs Predator, Heavy Rain. AVP, Star Trek Online

item.title: Giant Enemy Crab - Giant Enemy Crab - Done at Dunnes - The Pilot Show!
item.itunes:summary: Giant Enemy Crab - Done at Dunnes - The Pilot Show!
item.description:
Join us for the first ever Giant Enemy Crab! Slanik and Turpster do their best with what they have (Pretty much nothing) to bring you the first in what is sure to be an awesome series of Podcasts.
This Week its Mass Effect 2!
item.itunes:keywords: Slanik, Turpster, Giant Enemy Crab, Mass Effect 2, Game Review
